column1: If Democrats wanted to do anything more than attack @realDonaldTrump with non-binding votes they'd put real legislation forward.

Mr. President I support your constitutional role & all it entails. There aren’t 535 Commanders-in-Chief only 1. We weren’t in the sit room with you & shouldn’t pretend like we have the moral high ground to make that call any different. Thank you for keeping us safe! https://t.co/Gub9VREhCO
@realDonaldTrump will always protect our great military men and women!  The message has been sent loud and very clear! https://t.co/LOYWldvWiV
The #USMCA finally passed the House today! Here's my full statement. https://t.co/mIWAsBeeZ0
The House spent just 7 days investigating impeachment before moving forward with a vote. I am ashamed to be apart of this sad day in our history. https://t.co/TTNSgsoIWw

It was a big weekend for Tulsa area schools --> we have 3 state championship football teams!   Congrats to @OHS_Rams @Bixhighofficial & @LCStulsa for your hard-won victories this weekend.   All 3 went undefeated this year too!

Amazing to see companies re-investing their profits in their employees like this. THIS is how you create a positive work culture and foster loyalty & enthusiasm among employees.   https://t.co/0XYviSPygS
All I want for Christmas is U.... SMCA
Programs like SNAP were never meant to be a long-term solution. I applaud @SecretarySonny for his committment to reforming this program!

There is nothing quite as empowering as a job. No federal program has the power to pull a person out of poverty no government handout can help a person find independence and success. Only through gainful employment can a person find true stability.  https://t.co/TTMK2YZsQm

My colleague @RepMikeTurner exposed the Democrats' key talking point from today as made-up presumption rather than fact.   Q: No one else on this planet told you that Donald Trump was tying aid to these investigations is that correct?  A: Yes. https://t.co/PRyKTPmEgw

The lack of leadership from the Natural Resources Committee @NRDems is appalling. Partisan hearings partisan bills - all of this directed by their staff instead of elected Members of Congress. They claim bipartisanship but it's been 11 months & I've seen no evidence to prove it

It's officially been one year since I took the oath of office and started serving Oklahoma's First District in Congress. Thank you so much for this opportunity - I look forward to many more successful years! https://t.co/d98FMWiXVk

Breast cancer is the most common cancer in American women after skin cancer. As #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth comes to a close I join my colleagues in continual support of all those affected by this devastating disease. https://t.co/qcjWyUFdnP

Proof that our efforts are working! Pelosi is bringing the impeachment inquiry to the floor for a vote after several weeks of my colleagues & I demanding transparency & propriety in the process. This is a necessary step to ensure all our voices are heard.  https://t.co/vExyPgbJ5X
I’m with @SteveScalise @RepMattGaetz & nearly 50 of my colleagues outside the Intelligence Committee room demanding an open and transparent process. We must #StopTheSchiffShow https://t.co/QwMW3YmBle

I'd encourage any of my colleagues to come on down to @HSBCgop @HouseSmallBiz and listen in on our meetings - TRUE bipartisanship and mutual respect. It's a pleasure to have great leaders like @RepSteveChabot and @NydiaVelazquez setting that example. https://t.co/WF2Z7FH4w6

House Democrats refuse to make their impeachment inquiry legitimate because they know it's founded on false pretenses.   To treat @SteveScalise like this is shameful. Impeachment is a bipartisan process not a one-sided quest for revenge. https://t.co/tHQPN7e9Fx

A lot of people have asked me about this - I signed on as a cosponsor this week! The behavior of Adam Schiff is unacceptable. As the Chair of the Intelligence Committee and a senior House Democrat @RepAdamSchiff must be held accountable. https://t.co/DvmAztTNOF
Read the rest of my thoughts on the #USMCA here -->  https://t.co/5g0nnQac8t https://t.co/N9xtVh2DD4
Starting my day on @KFAQ with @PC1170 talking about Pelosi @realDonaldTrump & this impeachment circus. I’ll be live on @KRMGtulsa with Russell Mills at 7:30! https://t.co/z8kU2Ki83x

The hearing room is packed today as we discuss the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. Incredible testimony from the witnesses making it clear that we must protect the lives of our most vulnerable. I urge my Democratic colleagues to join with us to #EndInfanticide https://t.co/vnHMgEXYUI

Today I watched a room of Democrats try to rationalize why it's better for bureaucrats to be centralized in the Swamp instead of   moving the Bureau of Land Management in the heart of the West - where 99% of the public lands they manage are. #DrainTheSwamp

It's time to act on the #USMCA. Pelosi has no reason to hold up the vote - except to spite @realDonaldTrump.   This deal is GOOD for workers GOOD for business and GOOD for America. It's time to pass the #USMCAnow! https://t.co/JNziIJCbM8

https://t.co/7wzK8xcdEr  We all need to remember that bad people will do bad things.  It is our fundamental right to protect ourselves when we are in a time of distress.  Our 2A is our constitutional freedom to keep and bear arms! https://t.co/KxuCsHWDK1
Looking forward to holding another Coffee w/ the Congressman in Dewey OK on Thursday!  --> 8 am at the Washington County Adult Day Center. https://t.co/kxaJkKYKbr
Glad to tackle this issue and help bring an end to the crisis at our Southern border! Thank you @JimInhofe for joining me on this https://t.co/FvJtQ1Fs9s

Today with @housebudgetGOP we had yet another assault on OK's #1 job sector - energy.  The majority has focused so much time into this we've nearly forgotten our committee's purpose - maybe that's why we still don't have a budget? #gopHEAT
@OKCardinalChirp It was great to have Sophie on the team this summer!

Thank you for coming out to Tulsa this morning @RepAndyKimNJ! It was great to host @HSBCgop @HouseSmallBiz for a field hearing on the impact of federal regulations on our local businesses in Oklahoma. https://t.co/eYiSzb2Dz5
Proud to join my colleague @RepLizCheney and many others on this letter! https://t.co/c3ugAEzslL

This markup in @NatResources today is a slap in the face to the many people who have worked hard to draft legislation that could actually help our country. These bills will never get a vote in the Senate and will certainly never make it to the President's desk.

This committee has become a mockery of democracy and a mockery of good government. - @RepRobBishop  He's absolutely right. The Democrats on @NatResources don't care about moving our country forward - none of these bills have a shot at becoming law.

Last night I hosted a town hall with more than 4300 constituents. It was a great opportunity to hear from the people of Oklahoma's First District and answer your questions! Thank you to everyone who participated! https://t.co/iogA3NfYMd

I'm with @HSBCgop right now talking about how we can help our nation's veterans transition from service to become business owners. Our veterans deserve more than just our gratitude and respect they deserve all the help we can give them. https://t.co/TC0HbujVYc
Thankful for a country that values liberty & supports the freedoms of all our people.   Have a safe & happy Independence Day! https://t.co/vlNmWXNVUl
Spent some time on air with @PC1170 this morning! We talked about immigration veterans drug prices and everything in between. You can listen here: https://t.co/atS8PeHWG3
Today with incredible bipartisan support from 84 senators and 305 representatives we can FINALLY end the crisis on our Southern border.
It has been painful stressful and heart-wrenching to watch the crisis at our border worsen with every passing day while my colleagues refused to even acknowledge it.
Facts Matter. My hope in communicating the facts has been restored. If you keep communicating the truth about the facts eventually the politicizing of an issue can be overcome.
Let this be a lesson to us all: petty partisan games will never overrule the American people!
Speaker Pelosi does not have the iron grip on her caucus that she thought. They are tired of her blatant disregard for the will of the American people.
After 57 days of obstruction and denial we are FINALLY passing a border security funding package through Congress and delivering it to President @realDonaldTrump.

We now have the support of enough Democrats to PASS this bill and get it to President @realDonaldTrump's desk TODAY. But still Speaker Pelosi  & Democrat leadership refuse to allow a vote. This is UNACCEPTABLE.

The Senate passed a bipartisan  border security package yesterday 84-8. It includes funding for border agents to end the crisis at our border. If the House can't pass the same bill we shouldn't be going home this afternoon & we absolutely shouldn't get a month recess in August.
Had some time before the #CongressionalBaseballGame tonight to sit down with our interns eat pizza and answer questions they have about Congress. The future is bright! https://t.co/dSRRSpPHYn
The hypocrisy and political gamesmanship from the other side of the aisle is appalling.   I cannot stress enough how important it is to find a solution to end the crisis and protect our people.
Tonight we voted on an extraordinarily partisan bill that should have focused on ending the crisis at our border - the crisis that Democrats have been denying for MONTHS.
We debated supplemental funding for the border in the House tonight.   Remember it’s been 56 days since President Trump declared an emergency and asked for Congress to pass funding.
Tonight I argued in support of @realDonaldTrump's energy infrastructure agenda. We must have the room to become energy-dominant on the international stage. https://t.co/vuqcoxkbwh
Meanwhile @SpeakerPelosi is hurting the American people by refusing to allow a vote on the #USMCA which would be a GREAT deal for Oklahoma & our country.
Mexico ratified the #USMCA earlier this week there's no reason to wait any longer! https://t.co/nPdpgPUF6f
President @realDonaldTrump is following through on his promises to renegotiate bad deals and put American interests first.
The #USMCA is not only good for American farmers ranchers business owners and consumers but it's essential to the continued economic growth of our country.
Another week has passed & still no vote on the #USMCA in the House.
@IvankaTrump Delayed flight Pilots timed out another flight canceled....BWI here we come

Anyone denying the crisis on our border hasn't been there to see it for themselves.   I have and here's why it's time to end the standoff & give our border patrol the funding they need.  https://t.co/oRSvGkbA4Q

All this to say that the Democratic majority is doing everything in their power to shut our voices out of the legislative process. They want sole control but that's not how our government was meant to run.
In contrast when Republicans held the majority last Congress we allowed 45% of the amendments to be from the Democrats - more than the 38% from Republicans and 17% bipartisan submissions.
Of the amendments that the Democrats allowed for a vote 73% of them were from Democrats 11% were bipartisan and only 16% were from Republicans.
We were voting on amendments until after 1:30am last night on this first appropriations minibus.
At today's @housebudgetGOP  hearing I asked one of the witnesses if the #GreenNewDeal would kill jobs in Oklahoma and here's what they said. (spoiler alert: it would) https://t.co/TVBfzpLDSh
The #GreenNewDeal is bad for America & would absolutely destroy the energy sector that Oklahoma's economy depends on. We must put this dangerous legislation to bed once and for all.
I know how hard you work for your paycheck and I'm not going to let the government take that away from you. An additional $600000 of spending PER FAMILY is inexcusable.
The #GreenNewDeal is costly dangerous and out of touch with the wants and needs of most Americans. Liberal elites in DC don't mind spending unimaginable sums of taxpayer dollars but I do.
It was a great day in Tulsa with @VP & @SecondLady headed back to DC on #AirForceTwo https://t.co/4DyQoSycb1

Looking forward to welcoming @VP Mike Pence to Tulsa tomorrow. It's great to have the support of @realDonaldTrump & his administration while Oklahoma is fighting through this crisis. https://t.co/Ro2pFidA40
I look forward to hearing what the CBO Deputy Director has to say about the fatal impact of socialized healthcare (#MedicareForAll) on our economy and our people.
Socialism has NO place in the United States of America and I will fight every day to stop dangerous policies like #MedicareForAll from taking hold in Congress.
The American people will pay the price for these socialist policies. Taxes will increase and the quality of your care will drastically decrease.  #MedicareForAll
More than 1.7 million Oklahomans will lose their employer-sponsored insurance if the private health care market is eliminated with #MedicareForAll

#MedicareForAll not only doubles down on the dangerous practices that led us to this point but will completely eliminate free-market competition from the health care market.   (Refresher: free-market principles drive down costs reward innovation and encourage diversity)
Because of #Obamacare Oklahoma was recently down to just one insurer on the exchange.

In the years since not only has that promise been broken but premiums continue to skyrocket. Thousands of families cannot afford the burdensome costs of basic health care because of the government's interference in our health care system.
When the government got involved in health care 10 years ago we were told "if you like your health care plan you can keep it" a statement later ranked the #LieoftheYear by @PolitiFact

Capitalism and free-market principles have driven our country to the forefront in worldwide innovation exceptionalism and leadership.   These free-market principles are the only way to keep health care costs affordable.
In a few minutes I'll join my @housebudgetGOP colleagues for a hearing with the CBO Deputy Director on the Democrat #MedicareForAll proposal.
The women of Oklahoma had the right to vote almost a full 2 years before the 19th Amendment passed Congress making Oklahoma the 1st southern state to adopt full suffrage for women.

Today we celebrate 100 years of women's right to vote!   Women of all backgrounds and beliefs are running for office serving in Congress & state legislatures across the country and we are all the better for it! https://t.co/AXO8VE5vGB

.@RepublicanStudy released the ONLY budget draft in the House of Representatives this year.   We're the ONLY ones trying to right this ship.   The Left wants to hyperbolize doom but the true imminent threat is our national debt.   https://t.co/Xp6AfWIyu0

There's no way to sugar-coat it or deflect from the truth: Anti-Semitism is now a pillar of Democratic ideology.   The longer that @SpeakerPelosi stays silent the stronger the anti-Semitic faction becomes.  Enough is enough.
Even @CNN was shocked by these anti-Semitic comments. I stand with my colleagues like @RepLizCheney in calling out these radical beliefs.  https://t.co/3RtvD7zS6Z

This weekend's comments from @RepRashida are horrifying especially coming from a Member of Congress.   Anti-Semitism is the @HouseDemocrats new platform and @SpeakerPelosi is doing nothing to stop it.
A big thank you to all the incredible teachers who work every day to educate our next generation! #TeacherAppreciationWeek

Just last week @BAHSTigers teacher Donna Gradel was in DC as a top 4 finalist for National Teacher of the Year. Ms. Gradel has a long career as an educator & represents the very best of Oklahoma's outstanding teachers.  #TeacherAppreciationWeek https://t.co/nG9HAGIS18

I'm thankful for teachers who never gave up on me the teachers who taught me to work hard.   Growing up on food stamps education was the most important thing that empowered me to pull myself up to start a business and be successful. #TeacherAppreciationWeek

Teaching is oftentimes a thankless job but it is essential to the continuation of a functioning society. Good teachers inspire their students to reach for more & achieve their dreams. #TeacherAppreciationWeek https://t.co/fLcrFk0fJD
Whether I'm in Oklahoma or DC I like to keep a full schedule. I took @OUDaily along with me for a busy day of district work a couple weeks ago check out what we did -->  https://t.co/BfcsFaPvXq
3.2% GDP growth after the 1st quarter - there's no denying the power of @realDonaldTrump's pro-growth policies anymore! Let's keep up the work & continue to grow our economy.
He is risen indeed! https://t.co/czk3LECreR
Let's close the door on this sad chapter in American history & move on to celebrate the success of @realDonaldTrump's policies & leadership across our country.

.@realDonaldTrump was rightfully frustrated & upset that the outset of his administration was constantly under the shadow of this investigation. The outstanding results of his efforts always took a back seat to rumors of collusion & corruption.   Today we finally clear the air.
As far as I can tell @TheDemocrats wanted so badly for collusion to be true for the downfall of American democracy & the failure of @realDonaldTrump that they would say & do anything to make it true.

Many of my colleagues (cc: @RepAdamSchiff) have claimed for YEARS that they have substantial evidence against @realDonaldTrump that they know he colluded w/ Russia.  If a 2 yr investigation & unlimited resources couldn't find it I invite them to please bring it forward.

@realDonaldTrump AG Barr said it this morning & I repeat it: this was an unprecedented situation.   @realDonaldTrump had every right & every opportunity to invoke exec. privilege & censor the findings of the investigation. Instead he fully cooperated & supports full transparency of the report.
@realDonaldTrump We wasted 675 days on this useless investigation costing the American people more than $30 million.
This morning Attorney General Barr further confirmed the information we already knew: there was NO collusion between Russia & @realDonaldTrump or his campaign.
Special Counsel Robert Mueller's report is finally public & we can move on from this sad chapter in American history.   See my full statement here -->  https://t.co/ozHcmGJvlC
Check out my interview with @PC1170 this morning we talked about the Rep. Omar controversy division among @HouseDemocrats and the bipartisan work to combat the #OpioidCrisis  https://t.co/4MPaTFUCj0

We're working hard in Congress to make the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct permanent for Oklahomans to continue keeping MORE of their paychecks and for businesses to keep investing in their employees and giving back to their communities.
Consumers felt the lift as well when @PSOklahoma @ONEGasInc & @OGandE paid it forward in the form of savings for customers.   The #TaxCutsAndJobsAct continues to deliver!

OK locations of national companies like:  @Apple  @HomeDepot  @Lowes  @BankofAmerica  @CintasCorp  @comcast  @ChipotleTweets  @Starbucks  @Walmart  @uhaul  & more handed out bonuses to employees as a direct result of the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct

Oklahomans are benefiting from the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct --> As a direct result many Oklahoma companies gave out bonuses to employees: @AAONHVAC  @ExpressPros  @dominocstores @webcotube  @QuailCreekOK  @QuikTrip  & many more!

Happy #TaxDay Oklahoma! Thanks to the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct 90% of American workers have higher take-home pay.  Employers of all sizes are hiring raising wages increasing benefits and expanding operations.
Proud to join my colleagues on this letter. Looking forward to @DOIDepSec's final vote in the Senate today! https://t.co/a5xJ6a9H1O
We need informed leaders...leading committees https://t.co/ZN3IJQQw5E

@HouseDemocrats @HouseBudgetDems @realDonaldTrump In short these #100DaysOfDems have been a major disappointment to every American. With another 20 months of the @HouseDemocrats majority to go I can only imagine what disappointments are yet to come.

@HouseDemocrats Ignoring the fiscal cliff our country is standing on @HouseBudgetDems refuse to draft a budget this year - an unprecedented & petty move to spite @realDonaldTrump. Instead they put forth - & then pulled - a caps & spending bill that only increases our deficit. #100DaysOfDems

@HouseDemocrats With several bills they have taken major steps to infringe on our #2ndAmendment right to bear arms some even arguing to ban firearms entirely. We cannot take this infringement on our rights lightly. #100DaysOfDems

At every turn @HouseDemocrats have ignored the crisis happening at our Southern border & refused to fund border security. Instead they endorse open unregulated borders & want taxpayer dollars going to illegal immigrants.  #100DaysOfDems

@SpeakerPelosi @Ilhan @TheDemocrats Making campaign finance reform their top priority they failed to put together a bill that addressed the issue & instead violated our #FirstAmendment rights with the ACLU-rejected #HR1. #100DaysOfDems

@SpeakerPelosi @Ilhan With the rising popularity of #socialism @TheDemocrats have endorsed the radical unimaginable #GreenNewDeal. HOWEVER not 1 senator was willing to vote for it - & its creator was upset it went up for a vote at all. #100DaysOfDems

Enabling #Antisemitism @SpeakerPelosi refused to condemn the hateful remarks made by @Ilhan (on MULTIPLE occasions) allowing anti-Semitic rhetoric a free pass in the halls of Congress.  America has always been & will continue to be Israel's strongest friend. #100DaysOfDems

With several states endorsing #infanticide Americans' eyes were opened to the horrific reality of abortion. Instead of protecting the value of human life @HouseDemocrats refuse to allow a vote protecting babies born alive after abortion attempts.  #100DaysOfDems

@HouseDemocrats .@SpeakerPelosi long revered among Democrats for her iron grip on her caucus has lost control of the progressive wing of her party resulting in numerous flubs and embarrassing missteps. #100DaysOfDems
This weekend marks 100 days of @HouseDemocrats in the majority. In those 100 days they've failed to set a clear platform & failed to do the business of governing.  #100DaysOfDems

Yet again @HouseDemocrats are in disarray.   First they couldn't put together a budget proposal & now they can't even gain consensus support on their backup plan.   This is another embarrassing failure to govern. https://t.co/qbQ8cjyYeh

Today we're debating HR 1644 - the Save the Internet Act.   It would be a massive federal takeover of the internet opening the door to regulations on the free & open internet that Americans depend on & infringements on our right to free speech. https://t.co/C22Sd8AC65

What happens when Congress fails to produce a budget ignoring our jobs as trusted stewards of taxpayer dollars & instead proposes ideas that add tens of trillions to our national debt? Unlike the real world nothing.  Read the rest of my op/ed here ->  https://t.co/o8QqtmR2MP

This morning I spoke on the House floor about the irresponsible (and unprecedented) move for @HouseDemocrats to not draft a federal budget this year. @SpeakerPelosi said herself “show me your budget and I’ll show you your values” - so what are your values with no budget? https://t.co/sZdkJMyBzG

Getting started with @housebudgetGOP on a markup of the @HouseBudgetDems spending caps bill (this is what they're offering INSTEAD OF A BUDGET). It'll be a long afternoon you can follow along with the markup here -->  https://t.co/AQLIjQxMvp

@HouseGOP @HouseDemocrats We are standing strong in support of every human life today as we file this discharge petition. We only need 21 @HouseDemocrats to join us and we already have 3.   I urge my colleagues to join this petition to #endinfanticide

@HouseGOP .@HouseDemocrats refuse to support the lives of the unborn - or even the babies who survive abortion attempts and are born alive.   Infanticide is horrifying. I can't believe this is a debate we have to have in Congress.   #endinfanticide
Today my @HouseGOP colleagues & I will sign a discharge petition to force a vote on the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Act.   #endinfanticide
.@HouseBudgetDems have ONE responsibility --> to craft the federal budget.   They are refusing to do their ONE job. This is wildly irresponsible. A failure to budget is a failure to govern.
Glad to join the team Whip Scalise! Let’s get rid of this #GreenNewDisaster https://t.co/DC6fj6Qr87
Let's shut the door on this poorly-crafted bill and move on to legislation that will move our country forward.
The #GreenPipeDream would cause a lot of pain in my home state destroying the #aviation #aerospace & #oilandgas industries that make up more than half of Oklahoma's economic output.
@SenateGOP The #GreenPipeDream was little more than a half-baked plan to decimate American culture & our economy without a realistic framework to move forward.

I applaud my @SenateGOP colleagues for taking a stand against the dangerous rise of radical socialism in our country. The #GreenPipeDream is not legitimate legislation - that's why even its creator was against taking a vote yesterday!

Speaking with my fellow @westerncaucus members today against the radical proposals of the #GreenNewDeal  The Senate is voting on this today a clear choice between half-baked socialism and the pro-growth policies that @realDonaldTrump has used to revitalize our economy. https://t.co/xJgKfff5LW

As I expected Special Counsel Robert Mueller found no evidence of conspiracy or collusion between Russia and the Trump campaign.   See my full statement here: https://t.co/86te1adukI https://t.co/duM2r3EB0f
Exactly! https://t.co/3L01WPLtMc
No problem Mr. President!#BuildtheWall https://t.co/DIvsCY1sAj
@realDonaldTrump The Mueller investigation has been nothing more than a colossal waste of time & money.   Nevertheless the American people deserve to see the results in its entirety.
Make no mistake this investigation has yet to find any evidence of collusion w Russia or wrongdoing on the part of the President @realDonaldTrump which was the intent & purpose in the first place.

While this investigation has drawn on for far too long & has wasted millions of taxpayer dollars I believe that our taxpayers have the right to see what the government has been doing with their money instead of hearing bits & pieces of leaked information from political elites

Today I joined my colleagues @Jim_Jordan @RepMarkMeadows @DevinNunes & many others in support of H.Con.Res. 24 - Expressing the sense of Congress that the report of Special Counsel Mueller should be made available to the public & to Congress.
The President is thinking ahead rebuilding our fiscal health on a foundation of security instead of focusing on a quick fix.   We can’t put this off for the next generation.
With this budget proposal we begin the process of undoing decades of irresponsible spending in DC. It won't happen overnight and we shouldn’t expect it to.

@housebudgetGOP .@realDonaldTrump's budget plan provides for long-term structural change to the way our government has operated for decades & will maintain the economic growth we've seen the last 2 years.

@housebudgetGOP It's refreshing to see an administration that operates with business principles.   When the government gets out of the way it gives room for businesses to prosper stimulating their local economies & creating new jobs. As a result federal revenues increase.
@housebudgetGOP The federal government has no money of their own - only the taxpayers' money. It's on Congress to be good stewards of that money.
Heading over to the @housebudgetGOP hearing in just a few minutes - if you want to follow along with the proceedings you can watch it here:  https://t.co/7i0GBin2cl

I've been going through the budget proposal from @realDonaldTrump today & I'm glad to see he's following through on his commitment to cut wasteful spending & work towards a balanced budget.   Looking forward to getting into the details at the @housebudgetGOP hearing tomorrow

@Ilhan @WhipClyburn @HouseDemocrats In the strongest possible terms I condemn these actions from both Omar and Clyburn and I look forward to voting YES on #HRes183 condemning anti-Semitism across the USA and the world.

@Ilhan @WhipClyburn Clyburn violates the memory of those who survived the Holocaust the millions who were killed and those who carry their legacy to future generations.   This is unacceptable from a @HouseDemocrats leader.

@Ilhan @WhipClyburn The Holocaust was a systematic attack on the Jewish people with the intent to eliminate an entire race of people from the planet. It remains one of the worst and deadliest atrocities in the history of humankind.
@Ilhan Yesterday @WhipClyburn made inexcusable comments to justify Omar's anti-Semitism sending a slap in the face to the descendants of Holocaust survivors.
#HR1 is so bad even @ACLU is opposed.   https://t.co/v87HooQCyq
If you want to learn more about #HR1 and why it's bad for Americans @GOPLeader made a great video explaining the bill.  Watch it here -> https://t.co/8uLnAvtTeQ

#HR1 is riddled with flaws.   It puts our election system at risk of fraud & is unthinkably expensive.   My biggest objection is to the unconstitutional & dangerous limitations this bill puts on our right to free speech.  This bill is #ForthePoliticians and no one else.

Anti-Semitism is AGAIN at the forefront of the national discussion this week because of vile comments from the SAME person who caused the drama last time.   @Ilhan's anti-Israel insults have no place in our country. America is and always will be Israel's strongest friend!
Tulsa was glad to have you today @FLOTUS! Thank you https://t.co/kI8j062DEd
It's been a busy 111 days but I'm so proud of the work we've accomplished in that time.   Looking forward to everything this year has in store!  #HernWorks https://t.co/YqGgRn00vT
The consequences of Congressional inaction will be detrimental to the next generation and the country we hand down to them.

@RepAndyBiggsAZ Anyone who isn't alarmed by the $22 TRILLION national debt is living in a fantasy world. Fiscal responsibility is at the core of a well-protected and secure nation. With unchecked federal spending and no balanced budget we put the safety of every American at risk.

I'm proud to be an original cosponsor on a bill released yesterday by my friend @RepAndyBiggsAZ recognizing that our national debt is a true threat to our national security. It’s long past time for Congress to get our spending under control & address the ballooning national debt.
@Dylan_hurt_4 @USMC Thank you for your service! 🇺🇸
This is a clear sign of just how far @TheDemocrats are willing to go to stand in the way of @realDonaldTrump   We must hold these senators responsible for this vote.

The national debate on horrific late-term abortion and post-delivery #Infanticide is moving the needle on how people in our country view abortion.  Everyone who voted against this bill tonight is supporting the grotesque practice of killing babies post-delivery.

Did you know that in the last month since Democrat support of #Infanticide was brought to light the number of Americans identifying as #ProChoice has dropped by 8 percent.   That's a HUGE dip in just one month.
This bill would have protected children who were born alive or survived an abortion attempt.   https://t.co/pcNQfDK2nX
The #Senate just voted on a bill to protect the lives of our children - the vote FAILED.   This is appalling.

I sent a letter to @SecretarySonny today in support of @USDA proposed rule to enforce work requirements for able-bodied adults to get #SNAP benefits. 64 colleagues joined me.  You can read the full letter here: https://t.co/Vkcr02rAY0
Roses are red The "new deal" is green Socialism doesn't work Capitalism drives the #AmericanDream

The @HSBCgop met w/ real-world business owners to set our legislative priorities for the 116th Congress today.  One of the biggest issues facing our business-owners is finding access to capital. We have to minimize the gov intrusion in businesses & let our entrepreneurs thrive.

Even more alarming is that they don't offer a solid plan on how to pay for these monstrous socialist plans.   @HouseDemocrats are out of touch and out of their depth with their plans for the #GreenNewDeal

A few of the absurd points are to eliminate air travel completely upgrade or replace EVERY building in the United States of America plant "lots" of trees and put charging stations "everywhere". #GreenNewDeal
